answer:
You will need to contact your local health unit to confirm which vaccines your daughter received at school. The health unit will have this information in their electronic immunization registry. You can find the contact information for your local health unit here. 
You can find information on grade 6 vaccines here.
Immunization Nurse
question: My daughter was vaccinated at school last year.... grade 6 I just want to confirm which shots she received. She received 2 shots.
